channel.title: Price check please?
channel.description:
Yeah sorry I know it gets annoying but I wanna know how much I should sell it for. I fibbed about not botting years ago i botted 99 cook 99 fletch and sometimes i used to bot dung but i never got any bans etc. Pc pl0x in $ and gps to sell for $ :3 [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YPcOtTmYxEo[/youtube]
oh and yous probably wont see me anymore orr you'll see me a lot more. I'll either leave rs stuff completely ooorr go into pservs;3.

item.title: Price check please?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

mr extremez:

Well vn acc gl selling seems like its yours. From what you’ve told me it should go for 100 +.

Thanks. Should do if I find a place to sell it.
Sorry if anything I said seemed hostile.

Read full topic

item.title: Price check please?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

mr extremez:

Ok fine true if such a nice acc why sell is it even yours?

A few reasons, one I liked being a lot better than people my own level etc and I’d need to get another rapier to be good again and theres so so many retarded dungers on w117 and in the time it would take me to get another one I could’ve been 100m up from doing Pvm. Also, I was at that stage in Rs where I never needed to do anything I could just do whatever I want but to be quite honest it was getting boring anyways there was nothing fun to do so I started doing slayer(which you can see on the log).
Yes, the accounts mine. I’m guessing you never saw my thread asking if I should get ovl’s or extremes? Also, I made this account in 2008. At the time I never new what 1337 was and my friend the name l44t tank or something (he must’ve typoed) and he told me that l44t meant leet so I made the account l44t barrowz, I used to love dh(not so much now as I can afford much better things etc) so thats the reasoning behind the original name. Also I like having a low defence and barrows armours and if it wasn’t my account why would I typo the name l44t barrowz and keep it roughly the defence req for barrows.
I also have the details for this account, and still remember the first ever password for it.
I also have some media from like 5 months ago where clearly it is a very much lower level etc.
I used to have media from like 2 years ago but I upgraded computer in 2010
one of the earliest media I can get atm,

Read full topic

item.title: Price check please?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:19, topic:425895”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=528579.msg3856116#msg3856116 date=1324354005]
I guess… I don’t see how 20m of untrable pots korasi void and stream make it worth 110?
[/quote]
Well 120m makes it worth $60’ish instantly yeah? Over 90m xp, almost 2000 total so most things on Rs this account can do pretty easily. The pots give about a 15% advantage for mage, 6% for mage, 7.5% for melee? Which basically means this account hits as if it were a maxed acc on supers almost(pots to 114 str 115 range and 103 mage) so the herblore is really useful and since its 89 herblore people will want to take advantage. I’ve already got 20m+ in pots so they need not make money for a while before needing to restock. Enhanced excal(4) heals 400hp = amazing for tanking for and bossing. Fire capes are a sign of skill so people tend to think nice. Soul wars cape has a nice +12 pray bonus useful for slayer mostly. Elite void has a nice pray bonus. Korasi cheap pk spec wep. 99s are junk 99s but there 99s nonetheless. Accounts good for pking, the high attack means it pretty ofton and the str is okay nothing great(high for its level but its low for a barrows pure) the defence isn’t that bad unless your fighting a range maxed tank which there are at this cb lvl(107+9). This account can make up to 2m an hr at frost drags, up to 1m with the scroll of cleansing. Has some basics already like the necklace etc, has points in minigames like BA that have been half finished. Also it wouldn’t take as long to get another chaotic as its 85 = faaar higher prestige than when you start from one. The only bossing teams I get rejected from are maxed teams o.o. Also theres enough charms for 79 summoning. The def is wrecked, 71 def cause I wasn’t going to sell it and 70/71def doesn’t matter to me personally but to people it does for some reason o.0.[/quote]
Ok fine true if such a nice acc why sell is it even yours?

Read full topic

item.title: Price check please?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

mr extremez:

I guess… I don’t see how 20m of untrable pots korasi void and stream make it worth 110?

Well 120m makes it worth $60’ish instantly yeah? Over 90m xp, almost 2000 total so most things on Rs this account can do pretty easily. The pots give about a 15% advantage for mage, 6% for mage, 7.5% for melee? Which basically means this account hits as if it were a maxed acc on supers almost(pots to 114 str 115 range and 103 mage) so the herblore is really useful and since its 89 herblore people will want to take advantage. I’ve already got 20m+ in pots so they need not make money for a while before needing to restock. Enhanced excal(4) heals 400hp = amazing for tanking for and bossing. Fire capes are a sign of skill so people tend to think nice. Soul wars cape has a nice +12 pray bonus useful for slayer mostly. Elite void has a nice pray bonus. Korasi cheap pk spec wep. 99s are junk 99s but there 99s nonetheless. Accounts good for pking, the high attack means it pretty ofton and the str is okay nothing great(high for its level but its low for a barrows pure) the defence isn’t that bad unless your fighting a range maxed tank which there are at this cb lvl(107+9). This account can make up to 2m an hr at frost drags, up to 1m with the scroll of cleansing. Has some basics already like the necklace etc, has points in minigames like BA that have been half finished. Also it wouldn’t take as long to get another chaotic as its 85 = faaar higher prestige than when you start from one. The only bossing teams I get rejected from are maxed teams o.o. Also theres enough charms for 79 summoning. The def is wrecked, 71 def cause I wasn’t going to sell it and 70/71def doesn’t matter to me personally but to people it does for some reason o.0.

item.title: Price check please?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Thanks guys,
The banks at about 120m atm cause I bought a h’ween while I wait for a sale so the value would go up :D.
So would I be right in saying I could get about $100-$110 for the gp + acc? Cause if so I’d be well happy cause I can buy a second hand xbox with that:3.

mr extremez:

60 or 70 dollars total for money f cape and acc?..

I went on a botting site thats well known just now to check gold prices and it varies from 0.53 WU to 0.65 so you’d be saying the account itself with fire capes, arcane stream, elite void, korasi, 99s, 20m+ in untradable pots that are very useful and would be defo used are only worth $15:o? Ty for your opinion though:D.
Could anybody redirect me to somewhere I could sell this? I tried youtube thats not working aha, not sure where else. My friend said eBay it, would that work etc?

Read full topic

Price checking is under discussion, it’s not against the rules yet until another staff member comments.

but then again david, if someone asks if they could buy the account, this could turn into buying/selling, which does violate this rule:

RuneScape Discussion Rules [Updated March 12, 2013]

[ol][li]No buying or selling of anything. This includes asking for price checks on things you wish to sell.[/li][/ol]
